title: pro play submission

embed.description: Draven Pentakill basically 1v5. The benefits of lifesteal

body:
Rate my pentakill?
The enemy didn't want to finish me off.

You think it has a chance of winning?

replies.body: Nice play, but the frame rate was atrocious. If you want to win and want Riot to show yours you better fix that up.
How can I fix it? I just downloaded it like they said.
Thanks Mate. couldn't believe I lived through that
